body.name: REAHOME 8 Drawer Dresser for Bedroom with Shelves Large Storage Organizer Unit for Closet Living Room Entryway Office Sturdy Steel Frame Wooden Top with Two Additional Drawer Organizers(Rustic)TXK8R2
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 19 hrs 51 mins
features: [Portable & Easy to Assemble] Product size: 37.6’’L x 11.41’’W x 41.9’’H. There are an understandable assembly instructions and the numbered parts in the package. It is easy for you to assembly it within 30 minutes. The cabinet upgraded the side handles, so you can move it at any time. It is also suitable to used in multiple rooms such as closets, laundry rooms, bedroom,living rooms, corridors, nurseries, game rooms, entrance channels, university dormitories, offices, etc.

[High Quality & Durable] The sturdy steel frame and durable MDF wooden waterproof countertop provide reliable strength and stability. This top-board is durable, easy to wipe and clean, and air-dried quickly after using a damp cloth. This rustic brown folding drawer (non-wood drawer) is made of cationic materials, all other sides and gaps are made of high quality breathable non-woven synthetic fibre.

[Structural Stable] The shelf can be fixed to the wall using Anti dumping device to avoid potential safety hazards to children at home. Adjustable feet makes the dresser suitable on uneven ground to be stable and protects the floor from scratching.The four X cross bars behind has upgraded the structural stability again!

[Multifunctional Storage] REAHOME Storage Tower has 8 large drawers and 2 layers of shelves to help you store lamps, books, decorations and things in order. Two-size shelf-board increases the storage area and helps you take the lower items easily. The 8 drawers have a large capacity and two organized boxes as gifts help you sort out underwear, socks, ties, belts, accessories, etc. Private stuff and things you want to show can be separately stored into the drawers and shelf.

[Unique Trapezoidal Design] The cabinet is designed as a combination of drawers and trapezoidal shelf, which is more beautiful and practical. This cabinet was made of the rustic brown cationic materials and Elegant wooden handles on the drawers make it easy to open and close. This unique design is suitable to decorate for modern, rustic, retro, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: This was great for the price. It is easy to assemble and very sturdy. Here are my overall likes/dislikes: ~ It shipped with USPS, so they could not deliver it b/c it was oversized. So, by the time I got it in, the box was completely torn and I struggled to hold the box together and put it in my car. Once we got it home and unpacked it, we began putting it together. ~ It was very easy to assemble. My son (11) and I put one together and then he and his sister (7) put the second one together. ~ The frame of it is very sturdy yet it is still light ( it only took one person to carry it up the stairs assembled. ~ The drawers were a nice wooden-looking fabric. They are the fabric drawers so I was concerned with their sturdiness. the lining at the bottom is thicker than most of the fabric collapsable totes you get. ~ It has actual drawer pulls instead of just a fabric handle. ~ TWO parts of the frame were bent. They were fairly easy to bend back; however, they did not fully go back in place. This made assembly a bit more difficult (however not difficult enough to warrant a 4 for assembly).Overall, my only wish is that it wasn't shipped by USPS so that it could have actually been brought to my door. For the price you pay, you can not beat it. It looks very nice while still being affordable. It Does NOT look cheap by any means. I purchased two (one for each of my sons) and I will be buying another one for my daughter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks exactly like the pictures
reviews.reviewText: I assembled this dresser after assembling the matching nightstands. First thing to know is the box is heavy. I could not bring it into the house myself. Also, because the dresser is taller and wider than the nightstands, assembly of the base of the dresser is a two-person job in my experience.The pieces are labeled, and the step-by-step instructions are easy to follow. The x-bar in the back of the dresser adds to its sturdiness. When finished, it looks great. Fits my space and storage needs. I'm very happy with the price point and purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good but not great
reviews.reviewText: I was searching for something with drawers to put all of the (junk) we tend to keep around the house and saw this “dresser” and liked the looks of it. According to the description it was supposed to fit the closet but it was a bit difficult to actually get it it (this was my fault) overall the structure feels sturdy but the drawers are made of fabric and won’t hold much weight. They do come with some support that helps a lot. The front is not made of wood but a type of veneer and scratches extremely easily. The top part is made from engineered wood and feels “solid” the overall look is good and serves its purpose but for the price it’s on the “high end” this would be great to put toys. Will update if anything changes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really happy with this product. A great deal and looks like good quality furniture. Not too hard to put together as long as you have 2 people. Really impressed with the drawers and how much clothing it holds. Used for under garments and socks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, cheap, and nice looking little dresser
reviews.reviewText: This dresser is smaller, but still holds a lot of the little knick knacks in an insertable organizer (comes with 2). The drawers are fabric, but the insertable hard bottom sheet really stabilizes them. The frame has little tabs that keep the drawers in place and stops them slipping out the back. For being fabric, the print is nice looking, and matches with most of my furniture (rustic brown). The shelving unit is durable, between placement of wood boards, metal frame, and metal cross members.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Over paid for this item.
reviews.reviewText: Drawer knobs are not long lasting, broke easily.Drawers are made of fabrics, very flimsy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: super easy to put together but is time consuming if you’re doing it alone. it’s the perfect size and the drawers look like they’re actually real wood.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice but if ya don't fasten to wall
reviews.reviewText: Was as simple as bed frame to put together. And had better storage than I thought. Built well. The weight could be better. Definitely need to fasten to wall
